events.author: maria_dian_therese
events.post: Dear Barry, I and my family have always admired you and how you’ve made educating the world about The Holy Shroud your life’s work. But this, stepping up to the lectern in a huge Muslim Community to be on hand to answer their questions and avail yourself to them about This Sacred Relic was truly amazing. We applaud your courage and humility and how well you handled that historical opportunity. What could be more important?.
events.title: Congratulations, Barrie Schwortz
